name: push push!
description:
PUSH PUSH!

This game was inspired by the theme "Stronger Together" for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Controls: 

  • press the key that appears on the screen!

you must press as fast as possible to generate the greatest force and invite more people to help you, remember stronger together!!

we recommend playing full screen!

Development:

Toches Games is made up of a team of 5 people, in this particular project only 4 of them worked.

The game was created in 4 days (for work reasons and other difficulties), some assets were created by the team during the jam time. The code was started from scratch during this time, only base files were reused for sound handling.
The environment and the cars were thanks to Broken Vector low poly assets free, the sound effects and music were taken from https://freesound.org/ and https://www.freesfx.co.uk/
